content: row 8 k2tog k8 kfb k6 kfb knit to last 2 sts k2tog short row 8 k10 to end baby rhino page 14 baby rhino page 15 row 17 p28 sts row 10 purl row 18 decrease k10 skpo k4 k2tog k10 to end - 26sts work short row to shape belly row 19 purl short row 1 k11 w+tk row 20 decrease k9 skpo k4 k2tog k9 to end - 24sts short row 2 p10 w+tp row 21 decrease p2tog purl to last 2 sts p2tog - 22sts short row 3 k9 w+tk row 22 decrease k7 skpo k4 k2tog k7 to end - 20sts short row 4 p8 w+tp row 23 decrease p2tog purl to last 2 sts p2tog - 18sts short row 5 k7 w+tk row 24 decrease k5 skpo k4 k2tog k5 to end - 16sts short row 6 p6 w+tp row 25 decrease p2tog purl to last 2 sts p2tog - 14sts short row 7 k9 to end row 26 decrease k3 skpo k4 k2tog k3 to end - 12sts row 11 decrease p2tog purl to last 2 sts p2tog - 10sts row 27 decrease p1 p2tog four times - 8sts cast off all 10 belly sts row 28 decrease k2tog knit to last 2 sts k2tog - 6sts breast row 29 decrease p1 p2tog twice p1 - 4sts rs facing starting at rhino s left belly marker with yarn b pick up and pm at each end of last row for left and right lower belly markers knit 10 sts evenly along row ends cast-off edge and row ends to the right belly belly marker see fig 8 pick up along dotted line from a to b row 1 increase kfb k2 kfb - 6sts row 1-13 beginning with a purl row work 13 row stocking stitch row 2-4 beginning with a purl row work three row stocking stitch row 14 decrease k2tog knit to last 2 sts k2tog - 8sts row 5 increase k1 kfb k2 kfb k1 - 8sts row 15 purl row 6 purl row 16-17 decrease repeat last 2 row once - 6sts row 7 increase k1 kfb k4 kfb k1 - 10sts cast off all 6 sts for throat edge row 8 purl cut yarn a join yarn b continue as follows row 9 increase k1 kfb k6 kfb k1 - 12sts pm at each end of last row for left and right belly markers baby rhino page 16 baby rhino page 17 chin rs facing starting at rhino s left your right corner of the throat belly cast off edge cast-off edge with yarn b pick up and knit 5 sts across the cast-off edge see fig 9 pick up along dotted line from a to b rhino s left b rhino s left a row 1 increase pfb purl to last st pfb - 7sts belly marker belly marker row 2 knit row 3-6 increase repeat last 2 row twice - 11sts rhino s left row 7-9
